hulpus-etal-2020-knowledge.title: Knowledge Graphs meet Moral Values
hulpus-etal-2020-knowledge.author:
Hulpu{\textcommabelow{s}}, Ioana  and
Kobbe, Jonathan  and
Stuckenschmidt, Heiner  and
Hirst, Graeme
hulpus-etal-2020-knowledge.paperMotivationText: Many concepts in knowledge graphs are strongly related to moral values. This paper aims at mapping the MFD to different knowledge graphs.
hulpus-etal-2020-knowledge.paperContributionText: Exploration of the the MFD by investigating how well moral values are captured by knowledge graphs
hulpus-etal-2020-knowledge.paperResultsText: The analysis reveals big differences between the three explored KGs, both quantitatively and qualitatively. ConceptNet achieves high accuracies at predicting the class of seeds in a leave-one-out evaluation. The results on WordNet are well aligned with results obtained by related work in a similar evaluation. The seed class prediction accuracy of DBpedia scores last among the three datasets, but still significantly higher than random.
hulpus-etal-2020-knowledge.analysisFieldOtherText: no specific field (KGs cover all kinds of knowledge)
